original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1061)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(991)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4593)@</color> 秒內對敵方造成傷害的 40% 轉變為自身體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1061)@</color>to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(991)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy within its own range, and transforms into itself within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4593)@</color> 40% of the damage caused to the enemy within seconds physical strength.
